title: Ticket #2443: add a collector history file
description:
The collector could benefit from a classad history file. Example use case: glideinWMS would like to use the collector for aggregating glidein error reports, and having these logged would be helpful.

This feature could be implemented as a collector plugin. However, depending on the state of the classad history code used by the schedd and startd, it may be easiest to support this feature directly in the collector.
creator: danb
